alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 10:18PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Camden, Glynn, Brantley, southeastern Wayne and northeastern Charlton Counties through 1045 PM EST... At 1018 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Hickox, or 11 miles west of Woodbine, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Dock Junction, Hickox, Country Club Estates, Thalmann, Everett, Raybon, Waynesville, Waverly and Atkinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton; Wayne
